loginCard.title: Login
loginCard.signupBtn: Don't yet have an account? Sign up here.

currentResultCard.title: Results
currentResultCard.body: Take a look at our current results.

newsCard.title: News
newsCard.body: Take a look at our latest news.

requiredSurveys.title: Questionnaires to be completed
requiredSurveys.info: The different questionnaires for the study can be found here.
requiredSurveys.successMsg: Thank you! You have completed all questionnaires. We hope to hear from you again next week. In case you want to provide new information sooner, you can retake the questionnaire in few hours.

optionalSurveys.title: Change background information
optionalSurveys.info: If your situation has changed, you can recomplete the background questionnaire(s) below.  Unfortunately, we cannot show you the information you entered last time, or let you change your answers to specific questions only.

teaserImage.title: Welcome
teaserImage.content: Get started by signing up to participate in the study
